title: I Can't Believe I Did That To Him
itunes:title: I Can't Believe I Did That To Him
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 30 year old woman and I've been divorced for four years. I'm finally ready to start dating. So I agreed to let my sister set me up on a blind date with her husband's friend. I had never been on a blind date before and I was a little nervous. When I got to the restaurant and met my date. I was pleasantly surprised. This man is so perfect and we have a lot in common. We ate and talked and laughed for hours.....

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
